channel.title: Todoexplorer on CEZARY PIĄTEK
channel.description: Recent content in Todoexplorer on CEZARY PIĄTEK

item.title: How to manage TODO in your codebase.
item.description: It’s a good practice to make all things done at the first approach. But in the real world it’s not always possible - for example we need to ask customer for clarification and it will take some time, or worst - we don’t have enough time right now to implement things in the right way. In order to adress this issue, a TODO was invented to mark all those places in code requiring additional work.
